titleInfo.title: Correspondence calling for Black Student Leadership Conference May 30, 1969 in Harlem

name.namePart: Student Leadership Conference c/o Blackfrica Productions

mods.abstract: Letter to the Williams College Afro-American Society requesting their participation the May 30 1969 Student Leadership Conference in Harlem (New York, New York). The letter is signed by the conferences sponsors: National CORE, Cornell Black Liberation Front, Black Mind, Blackfrica Productions, East Wind, City College (coalition), Columbia (SAS), Queens College (coalition).
